testsuite.name: Using the rally utilities When getting an array of days

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When getting an array of days
testcase.name: should return an array of days without weekends

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When getting an array of days
testcase.name: should return an array of days with weekends

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When getting an array of days
testcase.name: should return an array of days even if dates are in wrong order

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When getting an array of days
testcase.name: should return an array of days spaced a week apart when there are more than 45 days

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When getting an array of days
testcase.name: should return an array of 30 minute increments when less than or equal to 2 days
